TopicTitle: Requiem for a Sequel: Marathon 2 Highlights set (mostly) to Mozart's Requiem mass.

Articles.Content:
If you enjoy Mozart, just listen. If you like shooting (or being shot by) science fiction aliens, just watch. If you like the synergy of both, watch and listen!

If you'd enjoy playing Bungie's Marathon 2 for free: http://marathon.sourceforge.net/games/marathon2.php
